title.rendered: Android TV Box – One of the Best Technology Used in Recent Years

content.rendered:
Android TV Box. Yes, it is the latest trending news in the technology field as using this TV box you can play videos, movies, games in your TV.

Android TV Boxes are becoming very popular all across the globe as it  allows the user to convert their normal TV into a smart TV giving wide variety of benefits like web surfing on television, streaming videos from mobile to TV directly, etc.

What Basically Android TV Box is?

Android TV Box is device purposely build for non smart TVs to convert them into smart TVs just by using a set top box like device.

Android TV Box are highly customized to meet the needs of users by providing them with an operating system in a box which they can connect to their TV and make it a smart TV. It is just like the mobile version of android.

You can do browsing on your TV, can play youtube videos, can see pictures, can play and see movies online in your TV only by using this amazing device.

In short you can do 90% of the things on your TV which you can do on your android mobile phone.

Ever heard about Amazon Fire TV Stick? Well it is a highly altered or say modified version of android TV box.

How Does Android TV Work?

The working of android TV box is very easy. All you have to do it connect the box with your TV and once the connection has been made you are now ready to use your TV for browsing and playing games.

You can install apps in your TV like you can install YouTube app to play YouTube videos on your TV.

Android TV users have the full access to Google Play Store using which they can download and install applications on their TV.

How many Types of Android TV Boxes are there?

There are many types of android tv boxes available in the market and online too. Some of them are cheap in price while some are high in price.

Although each tv box exhibit same characteristics except a few which makes them different from each other.

It has been seen that many low costing tv boxes comes with old or outdated operating system like android 5.0 whereas the high priced or say medium priced tv boxes comes with all the latest and advanced features which you can use in your android phone also.

There are many options like VISSIONTECH or Nvidia Shield which sell amazing android tv boxes.

Features of Android TV Box:

  • Playing Live TV:

By playing live TV we mean that you no longer need any satellite connected dish antenna. All you have to do is just connect your android TV box with your television and that is it. You now can stream any movie, any tv show online on your television without paying any extra money to anyone.

  • Movies:

Do you love to watch movies in HD only but your movie provider or dish provider don’t play movies in HD on normal channels and you have to pay extra to watch shows and movies in HD?

Well if yes then don’t worry. with android tv box you can stream any movie in HD print on your normal tv set too.

  • Sports:

Are you afraid that you might miss your favorite match just because you have not subscribed for that particular sports channel?

If yes, then just go and buy an android TV box for your tv so that you can stream any game which is being telecasted on any channel on your television.

Take the feeling of live game anytime, anywhere.

  • Web Browsing:

Just like you browse on your phone and laptop, you can now browse on your television also and all this is possible just because of android TV box. Browse anything like facebook, linkedIn, Google etc.
